column5: Got back down to the lakeshore for another couple hours this morning.  Went 1 for 2 again with one break off. The one I landed though was pretty nice, I think 33.5" length by 25" girth.  I figure it weighed somewhere around 25 lbs?  Wish I had put something in the frame to give it a sense of scale... I caught one slightly longer last year but this fish is WAY thicker, so I'm calling it my new PB carp! Looking forward to getting out again in a week or two. Mike
Very nice....I now know what if feels like to get one of these chubbies....lots of fun.
